alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 12 at 4:16AM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Anne Arundel County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water reaches the floor of the Maritime Museum in Annapolis, begins to cover Bowyer Road on the Naval Academy campus, and numerous businesses on Dock Street are flooded, along with the City Dock parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two and a half to three feet above normal. The high tide at Annapolis U.S. Naval Academy is at 5:56 AM on Saturday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Severn River at Annapolis MLLW Categories - Minor 2.6 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.2 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 4.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/05 AM 1.7 0.3 1.2 0.5 None 12/07 PM 2.4 1.0 1.3 3.0 None 13/06 AM 3.5 2.1 3.0 1.0 Moderate 13/06 PM 2.3 0.9 1.4 0.5 None 14/07 AM 1.2 -0.2 0.6 0.5 None 14/08 PM 1.0 -0.4 0.0 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
